name: Ghost Quest (lancethecat)
description:
This game was made for the 2023 7-Day Roguelike Challenge.

Draw white cards from your hand and click on highlighted spaces to move around the grid.

Draw red cards to click and destroy enemies in the highlighted spaces.

Between each round, you can swap out a random card from your deck for a new card that gives you more movement or attack options. Can you make it past ten rounds?

Thanks to the creators of the game jam for letting me participate; I had a lot of fun working on this!
